text: Evarkal ‘‘niccayamaka allah elai; nankaltan cimankal'' enru kurinarkalo, avarkalutaiya collai tittamaka allah kettuk kontan. (Ippati) avarkal kuriyataiyum, niyayaminri napimarkalai avarkal kolai ceytataiyum niccayamaka nam pativu ceykirom. (Akave, marumaiyil avarkalai nokki) ‘‘erikkum vetanaiyai ninkal cuvaittupparunkal'' ena nam kuruvom
